content.text:
# R37 expressway (Czech Republic)

}}
/
|terminus_a=Polish border 20 km away from Trutnov
|junction=20px D11 near Hradec Králové,
20px R35 near Hradec Králové
|terminus_b=Kunčí about 6 km from Chrudim
|regions=Hradec Králové, Pardubice
|cities=Hradec Králové, Pardubice

Expressway R37 () is an expressway in eastern Bohemia. Currently, it connects the most important cities in the eastern Bohemia: Hradec Králové and Pardubice.
None of these sections are signed as an expressway right now.
As of 2006, it has:
* 19.3 km between Hradec Králové and Pardubice (5 km 4 lanes, 14.3 km 2 lanes)
* 2.2 km in Pardubice
* 4.5 km under construction south of Pardubice
* 12.7 km in planning
* 44.2 km considered
